row.process:
:SET &CLIENT#=FORMAT("&CLIENTNR#","0000") :SET &DIR_TEMP# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP','&AGENT#') :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off !transfert of all the binairies unix for windows, for the client !:ATTACH_RES "STORE.UNIX_BIN", "FIND", "C" echo ************************************* echo Purge des archivages obsolètes, client &CLIENTNR# : echo ************************************* echo.
cd &PATH_ARCHIVE#\&CLIENT# set rc=%errorlevel%
if not "%rc%" == "0" ( echo " Le répertoire &PATH_ARCHIVE#\&CLIENT# n'existe pas" exit 0 ) else ( ! ! Liste des fichiers antérieurs à la date de rétention maximum ! echo. echo Liste des fichiers Archive sélectionnés pour suppression (*.idx, *.IDX, *.txt, *.TXT) echo. @forfiles /M *.idx /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c echo @file @fdate @ftime @fsize" echo %errorlevel% @forfiles /M *.idx /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c del @file" echo %errorlevel% @forfiles /M *.IDX /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c echo @file @fdate @ftime @fsize" @forfiles /M *.IDX /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c del @file" @forfiles /M *.txt /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c echo @file @fdate @ftime @fsize" @forfiles /M *.txt /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c del @file" @forfiles /M *.TXT /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c echo @file @fdate @ftime @fsize" @forfiles /M *.TXT /D -&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# /C "cmd /c del @file"
@set retcode=0 @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" echo "*************************************" echo "Purge des archivages obsolètes, client &CLIENTNR# :" echo "*************************************" echo ""
cd &PATH_ARCHIVE#/&CLIENT# rc=$? ! if [[ $rc != 0 ]] ; then echo " Le répertoire &PATH_ARCHIVE#/&CLIENT# n'existe pas" exit 0 else ! ! Liste des fichiers antérieurs à la date de rétention maximum ! echo echo ' Liste des fichiers Archive sélectionnés pour suppression (*.idx, *.IDX, *.txt, *.TXT)' echo find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.idx' find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.txt' find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.IDX' find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.TXT' echo echo ' Liste des répertoires Archive sélectionnés pour suppression (UC_ARCHIV_*)' echo find . -type d -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name 'UC_ARCHIV_*' ! ! Suppression des fichiers sélectionnés ! echo echo ' Suppression des fichiers Archive sélectionnés' echo find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.idx' -exec rm -f {} \; return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.txt' -exec rm -f {} \; return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.IDX' -exec rm -f {} \; return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) find . -type f -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name '*.TXT' -exec rm -f {} \; return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) find . -type d -ctime +&RETENTION_ARCHIVE_FILE# -name 'UC_ARCHIV_*' -exec rm -f {} \; return_code=$? rc=$((${return_code}+${rc})) fi
rc=$? exit $rc
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
